meanings.definition: relating to or situated on the uropygium
meanings.sent1: The uropygial gland in birds helps keep their feathers clean.
meanings.sent2: Birds use their uropygial gland to maintain feather health.
meanings.sent3: The uropygial gland is like a tiny feather spa for birds.
meanings.sent4: Her meticulous grooming routine was as precise as a uropygial touch.
meanings.sent5: The importance of the uropygial gland in bird hygiene cannot be overstated.

meanings.definition: secreting or relating to the secretion of the uropygium
meanings.sent1: The uropygial oil helps waterproof bird feathers.
meanings.sent2: Birds spread the uropygial oil on their feathers for protection.
meanings.sent3: The uropygial oil is like nature's own feather conditioner.
meanings.sent4: The uropygial oil acted as a shield against the rain.
meanings.sent5: The glossy sheen on the feathers was thanks to the uropygial oil secretion.
